item.description:
Let's once again meet at Conard High School for some tennis and all-around good clean fun!! All skill levels are welcome. All veterans and newcomers are welcome. In a nutshell, everyone is welcome. This group is so welcoming, I may even show up.

Bring you racket, some energy, some enthusiasm and, of course, liquids.

FYI....The Single Event group will be at Conard at 6 pm on Thursday, 8/6 so feel free to join them.

Any questions or comments? Call me at 860-559-7983. Hope to see you there!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis in West Hartford
